UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A Novel Dual-Targeted α-Helical Peptide With Potent Antifungal Activity Against Fluconazole-Resistant Candida albicans Clinical Isolates.
Literature.Author: Yang Y, Wang C, Gao N, Lyu Y, Zhang L, Zhang S, Wang J, Shan A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=2.69 µM,Human erythrocytes:100% Hemolysis=64 µM,Intestinal Porcine Epithelial Cells IPEC-J2:62% Killing=8 µM,Intestinal Porcine Epithelial Cells IPEC-J2:92% Killing=64 µM,Porcine mammary epithelial cells PMEC:43% Killing=8 µM,Porcine mammary epithelial cells PMEC:90% Killing=64 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans CGMCC 2.2086(MIC=4µM),Candida tropicalis CGMCC 2.1975(MIC=2µM),Candida parapsilosis CGMCC 2.3989(MIC=8µM),Candida albicans(MIC=4-8µM),Candida albicans(MIC=2-8µM)
